tools.name: save_submitter_name
tools.description: Save the worker's name after confirming spelling. Only call this after you have confirmed the correct spelling with the worker using the phonetic alphabet (Alpha, Bravo, Charlie, etc.).

name.description: The worker's full name, confirmed and spelled out

tools.name: save_contact_info
tools.description: Save the worker's contact information (phone or email). Only call after confirming the contact details.

tools.name: save_incident_date
tools.description: Save when the incident occurred. Call this after the worker provides the timeframe.

date.description: When the incident occurred (e.g., 'Early March 2024', 'August 2024', '6 weeks ago', 'Yesterday')

tools.name: save_incident_location
tools.description: Save where the incident happened. Call this after collecting the specific location or department.

location.description: Specific location, department, or area (e.g., 'Processing Plant B', 'Security sector', 'Warehouse')

tools.name: save_people_involved
tools.description: Save the names of people involved (supervisors, managers, witnesses). Call this after collecting names.

people.description: Names of supervisors, managers, or witnesses mentioned (e.g., 'Supervisor Carlos', 'Manager Roberto')

tools.name: save_category
tools.description: Save the type/category of grievance. Call this after the worker identifies what type of issue this is.

category.description: The category that best matches the grievance

tools.name: save_urgency
tools.description: Save the urgency level of the grievance. Call this after determining how urgent the issue is.

urgency.description: How urgent the issue is (critical=immediate danger, high=ongoing problem, medium=needs attention, low=general concern)

tools.name: save_description
tools.description: Save a brief summary of the grievance. Call this after the worker has described what happened.

description.description: A concise summary of the incident in the worker's own words

instructions.step4: Add these tool definitions in the 'Tools' section
instructions.step5: Make sure you have a supplemental LLM configured (Claude/Anthropic is already in your .env)
instructions.step7: Update your system prompt to instruct the agent on when to use each tool
